trans-unit.source: Provides settings for maintaining the quota size for isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于维护独立存储的配额大小设置。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a host application with settings to perform policy decisions in the host's implementation of the <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了设置主机应用程序以在主机的实现中的执行策略决策<xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the state that is represented by <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageSecurityState"></xref> is available on the host.
trans-unit.target: 确保由表示的状态<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageSecurityState"></xref>是主机上可用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the option for managing isolated storage security.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于管理独立的存储安全选项。

trans-unit.source: This property is equal to the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageSecurityOptions?displayProperty=fullName> enumeration value, which is the only value in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此属性等于<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageSecurityOptions?displayProperty=fullName>枚举值，该值是在枚举中的唯一值。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageSecurityOptions?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The option to increase the isolated quota storage size.
trans-unit.target: 要增加配额独立的存储大小的选项。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current size of the quota for isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置独立存储的配额的当前大小。

trans-unit.source: The current quota size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 当前配额大小，以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current usage size in isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 在独立存储中获取当前的使用情况大小。

trans-unit.source: The current usage size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 当前使用情况大小，以字节为单位。
